feature_bullets: MULTIFUNCTIONAL GROOMING KIT: 4 detachable attachments including electric shaver head, trimmer head, facial cleasing brush, nose trimmer head to satisfy any of your facial and body shaving, grooming and cleansing needs, enjoy hair-free smooth skin without irritation

SMOOTH & QUICK SHAVE: The 3D floating heads with precision blades of upgraded double-blade technique automatically adapts to the contours of the face, neck and even the jaw. Rounded edges move smoothly over skin for a protective shave
WATERPROOF & WET DRY SHAVER: Fully washable design for easy cleaning. It gives you the option of either a comfortable dry shave or a refreshing wet shave with or without shaving cream or gel
USB CHARGE & MAXLITHIUM POWER: Charge your shaver anyplace & anytime. Provide 60 minutes of cordless runtime after just 90 minutes of charging
UPGRADED LCD DISPLAY & ONE-KEY LOCK ----- Charge Indicator/Battery capacity/charging state of the battery is displayed in percent/Battery low indicator/Cleaning indicator/Travel lock indicator
